author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Investigation in response to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/36319.
Updates:
   * `SiStripNoisesFromDBMiscalibrator`: put `SiStripNoises` object on the stack, add `printDebug` statements (daab356b388632e98d9eb63e371b5ba33a381b35)
   * `SiStripChannelGainFromDBMiscalibrator`: put `SiStripApvGain` object on the stack, add `printDebug` statements (f4a93a70db9f3b257ab3d78165971f8d8a23d598)
   *  change names of output sqlite files (00f3faf1c6fb8b8b75af07791c879834c5c81614)
   * remove upfront files to be written from miscalibrator tools (aff7f8569b5186035fc50c2fcb2ebf3b14f31506)
   
#### PR validation:

Unit test run locally with `scram b runtests_testCondToolsSiStripBuildersReaders`.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: Update miscalibration tools in `CondTools/SiStrip`
